ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To provide users with a highly customizable, aesthetically pleasing, and resource-efficient i3 Window Manager environment that automatically adapts its color scheme to match their chosen wallpaper.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Auto Material 3 Theming â€¢ Lightweight and fast performance â€¢ Complete setup with i3wm, Eww, Alacritty, Fish, Rofi, Dunst â€¢ One-click installation with backup
ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides a minimalist i3 Window Manager setup with automated theming based on wallpapers using Material 3 color palettes. It includes a complete configuration for essential tools like Eww, Alacritty, Fish, and Rofi, all integrated and themed for a cohesive desktop experience.

ðŸŒŸ MentraOS | TypeScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To provide a comprehensive platform and SDK for developing and running applications on smart glasses, enabling intuitive, hands-free user experiences.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Hands-free operation â€¢ AI interaction â€¢ View streaming â€¢ Audio transcription â€¢ Photo capture
ðŸ“– Summary: MentraOS is an open-source operating system and SDK for smart glasses, enabling hands-free interaction with AI, streaming, transcription, and photo capture on compatible devices. It supports a range of smart glasses and offers a developer console and app store for extending functionality.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸŒŸ marktext | JavaScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Writing and editing markdown documents with a live, in-line preview for a distraction-free experience.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Realtime preview (WYSIWYG) and a clean and simple interface â€¢ Distraction-free writing experience â€¢ In-line in-editor preview (not a split pane preview) â€¢ Support CommonMark Spec â€¢ Support GitHub Flavored Markdown Spec
ðŸ“– Summary: MarkText is a free, open-source, and minimalist markdown editor focused on speed and usability. It offers a distraction-free writing experience with a real-time, in-line WYSIWYG preview and support for CommonMark and GitHub Flavored Markdown specifications. This fork aims to modernize the editor for contemporary macOS, Windows, and Linux systems.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

âœ¨ Text-Grab | C#
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Quickly and easily copying text from any visible content on a Windows screen, even if the text is part of an image or application element.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for Windows 10/11 â€¢ Extracts text from screenshots of any visible content
ðŸ“– Summary: Text Grab is a C# Windows utility that uses Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to extract text from any visible content on the screen. It leverages the Windows API for local OCR processing, allowing users to copy text from images, videos, or application elements that don't support text selection. The application offers multiple modes for flexible text grabbing.
